thread.title: An emotional birthday for Sneha | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: An emotional birthday for Sneha | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: An emotional birthday for Sneha | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 14, 2015, 07.15 am An emotional birthday for Sneha Actress Sneha recently delivered a baby boy Vihaan and has been recouping at home without making any public appearances. The Punnagai Ilavarasi made her first appearance after a hiatus when she celebrated her birthday on October 12. Instead of indulging in parties, the actress has the habit of celebrating her birthday in philanthropic ways. This year, she along with her husband and actor Prasanna visited city-based Sri Arunodhayam Charitable Trust. After cutting a cake, she hosted a lunch for around hundred differently-abled children. When she saw some of the kids being fed through a tube, the actress could not control her emotions and shed tears. Prasanna consoled her and led her out of the orphanage.
